item.description:
This suggestion was made at the cafe on Sunday. What is Glow Bowling? Glow bowling is when they turn off all the lights on one side of the building and turn on black lights, disco balls, fog machine, and crank up the music ---- disco, oldies, and today's music. Easy access from Route 128 and free parking in the lot. Join us!

$2.00 per pair of rental shoes

$28.00 per hour of bowling per lane, $14.00 per half an hour

MAXIMUM of 6 people to a lane


Herb Alpert Fans
.....Getting together a group that would like to see the April 22nd live performance in Boston
do you want to join us??
item.how_to_find_us: 6 Bowlers per lane - you'll find us!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Saturday Night Glow Bowling - Woburn
